subject:
[R] how to do multiple comparison of linear mixed models by
	multcomp package ?
body:
Dera all
      I want to do multiple testing by multcomp package. The document said
the package can do it for linear mixed models. But it seemed the mixed model
built by nlme and lme4 package could not be  recognized. How  to do ?
Thanks!


Best regards,

Liu, jcheng

Department of Biomedical Engineering,
School of Medicine, Tsinghua University,
Beijing, 100084, China.
Mobile$B!'(B086+13611190172
Email: liujcheng@gmail.com

and provide commented, minimal, self-contained, reproducible code.
